磰字的基本解释

磰
shàn
古同“??”，白土。

磰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàn］
［《廣韻》常演切，上獮，禪。］
亦作“磰1”。
(1)白土，白垩。
(2)用于人名。明代有朱瞻墡。见《明史·诸王传四》。

磰字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磰； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页836第14
【廣韻】常演切【集韻】上演切，?音善。同墡，白土。

磰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
磰字的起名意思

暂无。

磰
Basic explanation of words
磰
shàn
Ancient with "??", white soil.
磰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàn］
["Guangyun" often plays and cuts, goes up and down, and Zen. ]
Also known as "磰1".
(1) White clay, chalk.
(2) Used for names. There was Zhu Zhanyi in the Ming Dynasty. See "History of Ming Dynasty·The Four Kings".
磰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　磰; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 836 14
[Guang Yun] often play cut [Ji Yun] stage cut, good sound. The same 墡, white soil.
